Those who work for our federal gov't are patriots & provide critical services to our country and the American ppl, & I thank them. I'll work to make sure we learn a lesson from this #TrumpShutdown & ensure the jobs, livelihoods of federal workers can never be held hostage again.

Reopening the full gov't is the right thing to do. I look forward to having a serious debate about effective solutions to strengthen our borders, create jobs, allow Dreamers to stay in the US & provide earned pathway to citizenship for those paying taxes & not committing crimes.
